coreAtributes.authorTag: A small tag sewn into the waist reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: Enforcer's tactical trousers
coreAtributes.description: A pair of boot-cut cargo trousers made from breathable cotton rip-stop and reinforced knees and seat. The drawstrings around the ankles allow the legs to be easily bloused into a pair of boots.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the tactical trousers and [npc.verb(pull)] them up to [npc.her] waist before buttoning up the front.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the tactical trousers up around [npc2.namePos] legs up to [npc2.her] waist before buttoning up the front.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() #THEN practically [npc.verb(give)] [npc2.namePos] a wedgie as [npc2.her] #ENDIF [npc.verb(yank)] the tactical trousers up around [npc2.namePos] legs up to [npc2.her] waist before roughly buttoning up the front.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] [npc.her] tactical trousers and [npc.verb(pull)] them down before kicking them from [npc.her] [npc.feet].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] [npc2.name] tactical trousers and [npc.verb(pull)] them down before sliding them from [npc2.her] [npc2.feet].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] forcibly [npc.verb(unbutton)] [npc2.name] tactical trousers and [npc.verb(yank)] them off.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(zip)] up the fly of [npc.her] tactical trousers.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(zip)] up the front of [npc2.namePos] tactical trousers.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(zip)] up the front of [npc2.namePos] tactical trousers #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() && npc2.hasPenis() #THEN without much regard for what might be in the way, resulting in a close call! #ELSE . #ENDIF

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] up the fly of [npc.her] tactical trousers.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] up the fly of [npc2.namePos] tactical trousers.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] forcibly [npc.verb(unzip)] the fly of [npc2.namePos] tactical trousers.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] tactical trousers up to [npc.her] waist and [npc.verb(button)] up the front.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] tactical trousers up to [npc2.her] waist and [npc.verb(button)] up the front.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] forcibly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] tactical trousers up to [npc2.her] waist and roughly [npc.verb(button)] up the front.

displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] forcibly [npc.verb(unbutton)] [npc2.name] tactical trousers and [npc.verb(yank)] down around [npc2.her] legs.
